summary: Build a website (sarkariform.com) for publishing government recruitment information such as forms, admit cards, results, and answer keys.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Wordmark logo reading “SarkariForm” in a bold, legible style (sarkariform-logo.dim_1200x300.png)
- Simple favicon icon with an “SF” monogram inside a rounded shape (sarkariform-favicon.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a content model for government recruitment publishing with post types: Recruitment Form, Admit Card, Result, Answer Key. Each post must support: title, organization/department, exam/post name, important dates (as labeled key/value pairs), eligibility (free text), application fee (free text), age limit (free text), vacancy/selection details (free text), official links (one or more URLs with labels), status (Draft/Published), tags, and created/updated timestamps.

Add an admin publishing workflow secured by Internet Identity: only authenticated admins can create, edit, publish/unpublish, or delete posts; unauthenticated users can only browse/search published content.
Create public-facing pages for sarkariform.com: Home, category landing pages for each post type (Recruitment Form, Admit Card, Result, Answer Key), post detail page, and a site-wide search page.
Add sorting and filtering for public listings: sort by newest/updated; filter by organization/department and by tags; allow narrowing by year (based on created date).
Add SEO-friendly metadata and sharing basics for public pages: page titles, meta descriptions, and a consistent canonical-like URL structure for categories and posts.

Create a cohesive visual theme for the site (colors, typography, spacing, and components) suitable for an information-dense government-jobs portal, and apply it consistently across all pages. Avoid blue/purple as primary colors.
Generate and render required static brand assets for sarkariform.com (logo + favicon), and integrate them into the header and browser tab.
